animeTitle: 86 Special Edition: Senya ni Akaku Hinageshi no Saku
animeDescription: "I have a duty to see everything that happens. No matter how much pain and sadness there is... Because I am Spearhead's handler."86 Special Edition: Senya ni Akaku Hinageshi no Saku recaps the story told in 86 through the perspective of Vladilena "Lena" Milizé—the commander of Shinei Nouzen and the Spearhead Squadron.[Written by MAL Rewrite]
